channel.title: Error when I click run
channel.description:
When I click run, a Command prompt pops up and on line 4 it says...
Server already in use.
Then a small window pops up saying....
C:\WINDOWS\system32ntvdm.exe Error while setting up the inviroment for the application. Choose close to termanate the application. [Close]______________________[Ignore]
If i click ignore the next line in CMD pops up telling me Handlers are finished. Same if i click close.
Can you please explaine what the error is, and how to fix it?
Thank you, Aaron Geildorn

item.title: Error when I click run
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Thanks, ill try that now. I dont believe i have/had any open. Ill close everything and try again.
[size=8pt](this didnt work for me.)[/size]

I forgot I was using a new source. I havnt configured anything yet, maby thats the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Error when I click run
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

With the first part (server already in use) Make sure you have no other run commands open and x out of no-ip and utorrent(if you have) first before you open the run command… once you open it you can open no-ip and utorrent back up…
for the 2nd part, i’m not sure… check the things you last edited because you probably messed up somewhere… if you can’t find it out you have to re download the source.

Read full topic
